attributes.action: Treat carring a knife the same as carrying a gun
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is on our TVs day in and day out. One young person a day is losing their lives to this horrendous crime.
attributes.background: Given the alarming number of young people being killed with knives tough action is needed now to prevent this alarming rise to continue.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "treating carrying the knife the same as carrying a gun".

The Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate on a petition about knife crime for 25 March. You can find the petition here and watch the debate on parliamentlive.tv.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926
